```{r load-library, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)
library(plotly)
library(ggbeeswarm)
library(viridis)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggpmisc)


knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  dev = c("png", "svg")
)
source("./lib/readers.R", chdir = TRUE)
source("./lib/datatables.R", chdir = TRUE)

TABLEDIR = normalizePath(sprintf('%s/report_tables', .getpwd()))
```

```{r cp, fig.height=10, fig.retina=4, fig.width=10, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

df = read.dbTable('omicron_plasma/cp_titer.csv', tables_dir=TABLEDIR)

dfPlot = df %>% 
  filter(infection=='B.1' & var_name=='Omicron/BA.1' & month==1) %>%
  arrange(titer)

ggplot(dfPlot, aes(x=reorder(ref, titer), y=titer)) + geom_point()

```
